snippet.title: Cities: Skylines Plazas & Promenades Expansion Release Trailer | Available NOW! | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Plazas & Promenades expansion is NOW AVAILABLE! 🏗️

With Plazas & Promenades, build your own unique walkable cities and say hello to pedestrian streets, car free areas & modern plazas. Let your citizens walk freely on pedestrian-only streets while you build brand new city-service buildings and 3 new special districts.🌆 
Get excited for the brand-new wall-to-wall specialization and a whole collection of new buildings, assets and props  to detail your cities with. Create, manage and progress your pedestrian areas, small pedestrianized neighborhoods, park & bus plazas and huge downtown commercial strips just to name a few!

Accompanying Plazas & Promenades are two unique Content Creator Packs, 2 Radio Stations & a free update!

Links to purchase Plazas & Promenades AND ALL the other NEW releases: 

💻 Steam 💻
🏗️ Plazas & Promenades Expansion:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2008400/Cities_Skylines__Plazas__Promenades/
 🌆Content Creator Pack: Mid-Century Modern by Rev0: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1992290/Cities_Skylines__Content_Creator_Pack_MidCentury_Modern/
🏖️Content Creator Pack: Seaside Resorts by Geze: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1992291/Cities_Skylines__Content_Creator_Pack_Seaside_Resorts/
🦩Shoreline Radio:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1992292/Cities_Skylines__Shoreline_Radio/
🌴Paradise Radio:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1992293/Cities_Skylines__Paradise_Radio/
